SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
About
About class represents an information window that displays details about the application.
AppTest
Unit test for simple App.
BoxMenu
The BoxMenu class represents the main menu panel where users can enter their username, IP address, and port number to connect to the server.
Card
Class representing a Card to abstract the four card types of the game.
CardPosition
Enum representing the position of a card in various stages of the game.
CardRes
Enum representing the possible resources present on a corner of a card.
CardSideCornerTest
Test class for Card, SideCard, and Corner related functionalities.
CastCardRes
The CastCardRes class maps a CardRes enumeration to its corresponding PropertiesCorner enumeration.
Chat
A chat panel for the game, allowing users to send and receive messages.
ChooseAreaToPick
Enum indicating the area from which the player draws a card.
ChooseCardButton
Custom button class used for selecting cards in the game.
Client
The Client class is responsible for initializing and starting the client-side application.
ClientHandler
The ClientHandler class is responsible for handling communication between the client and server.
ClientPortSelection
The ClientPortSelection class is responsible for managing the selection of IP address and port for connecting to the server, as well as initializing the client with the appropriate view mode.
CodexNaturalis
The entry point for the CodexNaturalis application.
Color
Enum representing the possible colors of game pieces.
Controller
Controller class responsible for managing the players and interactions with the Model.
ControllerTest
Test case for the Controller class.
Coordinates
The Coordinates class represents a point in a two-dimensional space with x and y coordinates.
Corner
Class for handling card corners.
CornerButton
The CornerButton class represents a button with specific coordinates in a grid.
Counter
Class to count the number of resources each player has in their area, useful for gold card placement requirements.
CounterTest
Test class for Counter functionalities.
Deck
Class Deck that gets data from the JSON file.
DeckTest
Test class for various methods in the Deck class, including creation, drawing, and shuffling.
DrawingCardArea
Class that manipulates Decks and everything that is needed.
DrawingCardAreaTest
Test class for the DrawingCardArea class.
DrawingCardPanel
A panel for displaying drawable cards in a grid layout, allowing users to select and draw cards.
DrawingCardPanelListener
The DrawingCardPanelListener class listens for events related to the DrawingCardPanel and updates the panel accordingly.
Event
Custom event class that extends EventObject.
EvListener
Interface for handling custom events within the application.
ExceptionHandler
Interface for handling exceptions.
ExceptionManager
Manages exception handling by mapping exceptions to their corresponding handlers.
GameAreaFrame
Main frame for the Codex Naturalis game.
GameAreaPanel
 
GameAreaPanelListener
Listener for events related to the GameAreaPanel.
GameFlow
Controls the flow of the game, managing turns and game ending conditions.
GameFlowTest
Test case for the GameFlow class.
GameRulesFrame
A JFrame subclass for displaying game rules as a series of images.
GoldenPoint
Enum representing the points associated with golden cards in the game.
GuiClient
The GuiClient class provides a method to start the graphical user interface (GUI) client.
ImageCard
The ImageCard class represents a card with an image and interactive corner buttons.
InvalidCardException
Custom exception class for handling invalid card exceptions.
InvalidCardExceptionHandler
Handles InvalidCardException by notifying the server and user about the invalid card play.
MainMenu
The MainMenu class represents the main window of the application, allowing users to enter connection details and navigate to different parts of the application.
Model
Class in which the Model is properly set up to start the match.
ModelChangeListener
The ModelChangeListener interface defines the methods that must be implemented by any class that wants to be notified of changes to the model.
ModelTest
Test class for the Model class.
Node
Class for the placement of cards.
NodePHTest
Test class for Node and PlaceHolder classes.
ObjectivePoints
Enum representing different types of objective points in a game.
PlaceHolder
Class representing a placeholder in the play area.
PlaceholderNotValid
Custom exception class for handling invalid placeholder exceptions.
PlaceholderNotValidHandler
Handles PlaceholderNotValid exceptions by notifying the server and user about the invalid placeholder.
PlayCardArea
The PlayCardArea class represents the area where cards are played in the game.
Player
All the attributes and methods for the management of the Player.
PlayerCardArea
Represents the area of a player within a card game, holding their hand, played cards, and managing interactions with game nodes.
PlayerCardAreaTest
 
PlayerTest
Test case for the Player class.
PortSelection
Main class of the server, started when you select option 1 in CodexNaturalis.java.
Position
Enum representing the positions of corners on a card.
PropertiesCorner
Enum representing all possible items that can be present in a corner of a card.
RMIClient
The RMIClient class is responsible for managing the client's connection to the server using RMI (Remote Method Invocation).
RMIClientCallbackImpl
The RMIClientCallbackImpl class implements the RMIClientCallbackInterface and handles the communication between the RMI server and the RMI client.
RMIClientCallbackInterface
The RMIClientCallbackInterface is an RMI (Remote Method Invocation) interface that defines the methods the server can call on the client.
RMIServer
Classe RMIServer che gestisce l'inizializzazione e la gestione del server RMI.
RMIServerImpl
The RMIServerImpl class is an implementation of the RMIServerInterface.
RMIServerInterface
The RMIServerInterface defines the methods that the RMI server will expose to clients.
ScoreBoard
Class representing the scoreboard for the game.
ScoreboardPanel
A panel that displays the scoreboard for the game, including public objectives and player tokens.
ScoreboardTest
Test case for the ScoreBoard class.
SelectObjStarter
The SelectObjStarter class represents a JFrame where the user selects a starter card and an objective card.
Server
Main server class that handles TCP and RMI client connections, manages game state, and communicates with clients.
ServerClientHandler
Handles client connections and processes commands from both TCP and RMI clients.
SetInitialGame
The SetInitialGame class represents a panel where the user sets up the initial game parameters.
Side
Enum representing the side of a card.
SideCard
Class for handling card sides.
StatusGame
Enum representing the status of the game progression.
TCPClient
The TCPClient class handles the client-side logic for connecting to a server using TCP.
TCPServer
 
TextField
Custom JTextField that clears its default text on the first interaction (click or key press).
Type
Enum representing the types of decks and corresponding cards present in the game.
View
Abstract class representing the view component in the MVC architecture.
ViewGUI
Concrete class extending View to provide a GUI-based implementation of the view component.
ViewTUI
Text User Interface (TUI) version of the game view.
WaitingScreen
The WaitingScreen class represents a waiting screen displayed to the user while waiting for other players to join.
